    • Constructor Detail

      • GridView

        public GridView(int rows,
                int cols,
                int cellSize,
                int imageMargin,
                java.util.Observable observeObj)
        Creates a new GridView with the given number of rows, columns. Grid lines are set to visible with a thickness of 1. The Dimension of this GridView is calculated and set to (cols*cellSize) x (rows*cellSize) plus the space the grid lines take up.
        Parameters:
        rows - The number of rows in this GridView
        cols - The number of columns in this GridView
        cellSize - The size in pixels of each cell
        imageMargin - the GridObject image inside each cell is shrunk so that there is a margin of the specified number of pixels
        observeObj - An Observable object that updates this view

      • GridView

        public GridView(int rows,
                int cols,
                int cellSize,
                int imageMargin,
                int gridLineThickness,
                java.util.Observable observeObj)
        Creates a new GridView with the given number of rows, columns and grid lines turned on with the given thickness. The Dimension of this GridView is calculated and set to (cols*cellSize) x (rows*cellSize) plus the space the grid lines take up.
        Parameters:
        rows - The number of rows in this GridView
        cols - The number of columns in this GridView
        cellSize - The size in pixels of each cell
        imageMargin - the GridObject image inside each cell is shrunk so that there is a margin of the specified number of pixels
        gridLineThickness - The thickness in pixels of the grid lines
        observeObj - An Observable object that updates this view
